products.name: Nomad Pouch
products.description: A sleek and adaptable organizer designed for various needs. Perfect for travel essentials, tech gadgets, or everyday items, ensuring convenient and stylish storage on the go.
products.image_alt: White fabric pouch with white zipper, black zipper pull, and black elastic loop.

products.name: Zip Tote Basket
products.description: A practical and spacious carryall with a secure zip closure, combining style and function for organized storage.
products.image_alt: Front of tote bag with washed black canvas body, black straps, and tan leather handles and accents.

products.name: Medium Stuff Satchel
products.description: Compact and versatile satchel for everyday essentials, offering convenient storage with a touch of sophistication.
products.image_alt: Front of satchel with blue canvas body, black straps and handle, drawstring top, and front zipper pouch.

products.name: High Wall Tote
products.description: A chic tote featuring elevated sidewalls, providing extra capacity and security while maintaining a trendy aesthetic.
products.image_alt: Front of zip tote bag with black canvas, black handles, and orange drawstring top.

products.name: Zip Tote Basket
products.description: A practical and spacious carryall with a secure zip closure, combining style and function for organized storage.
products.image_alt: Front of zip tote bag with white canvas, black canvas straps and handle, and black zipper pulls.

products.name: Zip High Wall Tote
products.description: A stylish tote with zippered closure and raised walls, ensuring both fashion-forward design and secure storage space.
products.image_alt: Front of zip tote bag with white canvas, blue canvas straps and handle, and front zipper pocket.
